definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The developmental time of each ramet was basically same.
sentences.chinese: 結縷草無性系各分株的發育時間基本相同。

sentences.english: Girdling and other treatments can induce polypoid plants to flower earlier.
sentences.chinese: 用環剝樹皮等方法可以誘導多倍體無性系提早開花。

sentences.english: Field contrast experiments were done among every poplar clones.
sentences.chinese: 對各無性系進行了田間對比試驗。

sentences.english: A lot of asexual people do want relationships and children.
sentences.chinese: 很多無性人士當然期待愛情和孩子。

sentences.english: The patient with Schizoid Personality Disorder is asexual.
sentences.chinese: 對於有分裂性人格障礙的患者，他們是無性能力的。

sentences.english: This is China"s first exploration depth of the documentary work marriage asexual."
sentences.chinese: 這是中國第一部深度探查無性婚姻的紀實作品。

sentences.english: In respect of asexual propagation, both of the two species can produce viviparous plantlets.
sentences.chinese: 在無性繁殖方面，二者都通過克隆生長形成胎生苗。

sentences.english: Genetic Parameter Estimation and Analysis on Improvement Effect of High-Yielding Guttapercha Clones Associate with Eucommia ulmoides Oliv.
sentences.chinese: 杜仲高產膠無性系遺傳參數估計與改良效果分析。

sentences.english: So is a sexless marriage ever okay?
sentences.chinese: 因此，你還覺得無性婚姻好嗎？

sentences.english: But it is the laboratory-made clones that upset people.
sentences.chinese: 讓人反感的是實驗室裏進行的無性繁殖。

sentences.english: These are inherent and apparently permanent and can be propagated vegetatively.
sentences.chinese: 這些具有內在的和明顯的遺傳性，並可以無性繁殖。

sentences.english: Handsome then loaded only with human beings on the asexual reproduction.
sentences.chinese: 耍酷裝帥的話人類就只得用無性生殖。

sentences.english: It arises by fusion of haploid gametes produced by the haploid generation (GAMETOPHYTE).
sentences.chinese: 無性生殖可產生單倍體的孢子。

sentences.english: After many generations clonal propagation, their characters can be inherited steadily.
sentences.chinese: 經多代異地無性繁殖，此性狀能穩定遺傳。

sentences.english: Its use is limited to the preservation of breeding material or the establishment of clonal seed orchards.
sentences.chinese: 其用途僅限於保持育種材料或建立無性系種子園。

sentences.english: Each clone has the same genetic information as the original.
sentences.chinese: 每個無性系都具有與母體相同的遺傳信息。

definition: lit. to share the same bed with different dreams (idiom); ostensible partners with different agendas/strange bedfellows/marital dissension
lit. you hoodwink me and I cheat you (idiom); fig. mutual deception/each tries to outwit the other/dog eats dog and devil take the hindmost
to caress/to fondle/to look after (tenderly)/affectionate care
to resign oneself to adversity (idiom); to grin and bear it/to submit meekly to insults, maltreatment, humiliation etc
lit. heaven's law and earth's principle (idiom); fig. right and proper/right and unalterable/a matter of course
lit. find a stage, put on a comedy (idiom); to join in the fun/to play along according to local conditions
lit. doesn't hurt, doesn't tickle (idiom); sth is wrong, but not quite sure what/fig. not getting to any matter of substance/scratching the surface/superficial/perfunctory
to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
